definition: Teachers' Day (September 10th in PRC and Confucius's birthday, September 28th in Taiwan)
master of martial arts, in former times often employed by a landlord to teach fighting skills and guard the house/(fig.) sb who arrogantly and condescendingly lectures others

sentences.english: Many teachers are waiting for new replacements before retiring.
sentences.chinese: 許多教師正在等候新進人員，以便退休。

sentences.english: Teacher is a key factor in actualizing education for quality.
sentences.chinese: 教師是實施素質教育的關鍵因素。

sentences.english: Teachers in schools have been rubbished for the last ten years.
sentences.chinese: 過去十年學校教師一直受抨擊。

sentences.english: Some of the women-teachers are usually proud of their position of being a Diana.
sentences.chinese: 有些女教師常常以保持獨身主義地位而自豪。

sentences.english: The new teacher really rates with the director of our department.
sentences.chinese: 這位新來的教師深受我係系主任的好評。

sentences.english: There was no teacher to direct the class.
In classroom, students are reward or punish by teachers.
sentences.chinese: 課堂賞罰施動者是教師，而受動者是學生。

sentences.english: At that time, most of the deans and teachers of the department are my teachers.
sentences.chinese: 那時系裏的主任和教師大半是我的老師。

sentences.english: Another career path for teachers focuses on education administration.
sentences.chinese: 教師工作的另一個出路就是教育管理。

sentences.english: Some teachers tend to spoon-feed their students.
sentences.chinese: 有些教師往往填鴨式地教育他們的學生。

sentences.english: Hu calls on teachers to embrace innovation.
sentences.chinese: 胡錦濤要求教師要勇於創新。

sentences.english: Sorry. Mr. Green can't see you now.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，格林師長教師此刻不能見您。

sentences.english: During summer vacations some teachers attend seminars at college.
sentences.chinese: 暑假裏，一些教師在學院裏參加研究班。

sentences.english: The demand of the teacher what kind of teach a research?
sentences.chinese: 教師需要什麼樣的教科研？

sentences.english: Teachers should be responsible and time-oriented.
sentences.chinese: 教師要有責任感且要時間觀念很強。

definition: to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
student/member of an institution of learning/officer cadet
head of a household/family head/patriarch/parent or guardian of a child
